Articles.Content:
Is there any way to fix problem with date above Year: 69 ? I really want to continue my game (I know I can play) but a minus date is annoying. The first time I was thinking it's problem with my one of addon which I use but then I checked it on unmodded version of KSP and still the same problem :|

I was thinking to change UT value in save file to smaller but it might mess up my ships (with and/or without Kerbals on aboard).

So is there any good solution for this?

It's due to the fact that KSP can only save values to so many digits (32, I think?), and because of how binary numbers work, once you pass the maximum value you will come back to negative the maximum value. I'm fairly sure it will eventually loop back around. You could time warp until it comes back to zero, but that would take a long time.

Changing the UT value will rewind the ships along their orbits by however long you change it by. If all your ships are landed or on stable orbits (and not intending to rendezvous imminently), they will be fine, just as different points in their orbits.

Edited March 21, 2015 by TheMoonRover
